mapper.insert: insert into question_state (user_id, main_id, sub_id, is_starred, state) values (#{userId}, #{mainId}, #{subId}, #{isStarred}, #{state})
mapper.select: select qs.main_id as mainId, mq.title as title, qs.sub_id as subId, sq.description as description from main_question mq, sub_question sq, (select * from question_state where user_id = #{userId} and is_starred = 1) qs where mq.id = qs.main_id and sq.id = qs.sub_id
